answers.answer: Omg I miss cereal sooo much! I want honey combs!
Im so hungry but i don't like to go to the kitchen when every one is in the living room watching me.I hate hate hate when they comment when I'm about to eat.
40 weeks and 1 day! I love cereal but since being pregnant it taste weird to me lol
hahaha I eat frosted flakes at least once a day.
I have diabetes cereal is off limits ;( aw my family doesn't think I eat enough because if the strict diet my doctor has me on. My Mexican mom and gma just want to feed me things I can't have D;
I passed my glucose test by 1 point.I got lucky. But she did tell me less carbs and more protienI just got a new Dr today and i love her! She answered all my questions and she is so nice
Omg, I eat cereal at least twice a day lol. But no sugary stuff, im a weird one and I actually prefer the healthy stuff like Special K, Cheerios, ect. Mmm I could live off of Special K :)

question: 30 weeks today:)I want frosted flakes so bad right now:(
title: My sweet baby is a cabbage today:)
